meanings.definition: Taking up more space; large in volume.
meanings.sent1: The new sofa was bulkier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The elephant is bulkier than the mouse.
meanings.sent3: The tiny car felt jealous of the bulkier trucks on the road.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, making it feel bulkier with joy.
meanings.sent5: The clouds grew bulkier as the storm approached, darkening the sky.

meanings.definition: Having a larger size or weight than something else.
meanings.sent1: The suitcase felt bulkier after she packed all her clothes.
meanings.sent2: The sumo wrestler is bulkier than the gymnast.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked bulkier with all the frosting piled on top.
meanings.sent4: His words weighed bulkier on her heart than she expected.
meanings.sent5: The tree's shadow grew bulkier as the sun began to set.
